unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit Indian Roads!**
normalised: auto buzz new wheels hit indian roads

unnormalised: Namaste, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up because the Indian automotive scene is hotter than a Delhi summer right now! Several new vehicles just launched, and they're all vying for your attention.
normalised: namaste auto enthusiasts buckle up because the indian automotive scene is hotter than a delhi summer right now several new vehicles just launched and they are all vying for your attention

unnormalised: First up, Dr. Reddy’s unveiled his dream project, the “Maruti Mini Majnu” – a super compact city car priced attractively around Rs. 4.5 Lakh. Perfect for navigating those crazy Bangalore traffic jams, right?
normalised: first up doctor reddy's unveiled his dream project the maruti mini majnu a super compact city car priced attractively around rupees four point five lakh perfect for navigating those crazy bangalore traffic jams right

unnormalised: Then, Mahindra surprised us all with their "Scorpio Stinger," a rugged SUV boasting improved fuel efficiency and a whopping 200 km range on a single charge (electric version, folks!). It's got more space inside than my chacha's old Ambassador!
normalised: then mahindra surprised us all with their scorpio stinger a rugged S U V boasting improved fuel efficiency and a whopping two hundred kilometer range on a single charge electric version folks it has got more space inside than my chacha's old ambassador

unnormalised: Tata is also in the game with a new trim level for the Nexon, featuring a sunroof and fancy ambient lighting. They’re calling it the "Nexon XZ+ Lunar Edition" – inspired by Chandrayaan-3 apparently!
normalised: tata is also in the game with a new trim level for the nexon featuring a sunroof and fancy ambient lighting they are calling it the nexon X Z plus lunar edition inspired by chandrayaan three apparently

unnormalised: Plus, there's whispers of a new Royal Enfield bike coming soon – a cafe racer with a claimed 60 bhp engine! And Hyundai just opened a massive new showroom in Surat, spanning over 5,000 sq ft! What a time to be alive (and car shopping!). Stay tuned for more updates!
normalised: plus there is whispers of a new royal enfield bike coming soon a cafe racer with a claimed sixty b h p engine and hyundai just opened a massive new showroom in surat spanning over five thousand square feet what a time to be alive and car shopping stay tuned for more updates
